name: wls
description: Experience Sampling Method (ESM) Platform for research.

scripts.precommit: lerna run lint && npm run prettier
scripts.precommit-fix: lerna run lint-fix && npm run prettier-fix
scripts.clean-install: rm -rf node_modules/ .npm yarn.lock && lerna exec rm -- -rf node_modules && lerna bootstrap

hooks.pre-commit: npm run precommit-fix && npm run precommit
hooks.post-commit: git add $(git diff-tree --no-commit-id --name-only -r $(git rev-parse HEAD)) && HUSKY_SKIP_HOOKS=1 git commit --amend --no-edit

author: Marceli Wac
